title: How to find mystery skin gift?
body: So yea, I kinda clicked through that splash screen that I got a mystery gift from Riot without seeing what skin it is. Now I can't find anyway to find out wtf I got? Am I missing something?

replies.body:
You got Neon Strike Vi.

Nice!

May you be able to tell me what I might of gotten? Seem to have gotten the same problem :c

Thanks either way ( if you even read this I appreciate the time taken c: )

> [{quoted}](name=iiamsean,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=raLOjRnv,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-01-11T03:28:41.727+0000)
>
> May you be able to tell me what I might of gotten? Seem to have gotten the same problem :c
> 
> Thanks either way ( if you even read this I appreciate the time taken c: )

Hi IIamsean,

Submit a ticket to Riot at http://support.leagueoflegends.com, who can check and confirm which skin you got :-) Riot don't always reply on here, so a ticket is the best way to get a response :-)
Thanks, I made the common mistake of going to the forums first. Guess some people (including me) need the reminder! c:

> [{quoted}](name=iiamsean,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=raLOjRnv,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-11T04:26:24.341+0000)
>
> Thanks, I made the common mistake of going to the forums first. Guess some people (including me) need the reminder! c:

No problem - the forums are useful for technical issues, but due to the sensitive nature of account and billing issues, they're mainly handled through ticketing.

If Riot see it (like in this instance) - great! But it's fairly uncommon :-)

Go to the store, scroll to the bottom, select purchases, gifting history and see if it's there?

If not, you probably just have to go through your champs one-by-one until you notice a skin you didnt have before.
I have the same issue here from oceanic server. Can someone (from Riot) give me insights.

Thanks a lot Hollymonster! 

I have over 100 skins but did not have a Vi one at all, that rocks.
Rito plz, surely there is a way to know what you got besides that splash screen?

Nothing there.

Well this blows... i have almost all champions unlocked. :x
